Articles.Content:
Idea: If you hit an asteroid too hard it breaks into smaller, 2.5m diameter rocks.

A: 2 rocks

B: 4 rocks

C: 6 rocks

D: 12 rocks

E: Wow that's a lot of rocks. (20)

This might even be an incentive for some players not to break asteroids, because then you'd have a sudden huge vessel count in your area.

These rocks can have a sample taken for lower science values, but can be returned and recovered. (Unless they break on the surface of Kerbin, where their science gain is minimal) Basically, the science gain is based on what situation the rocks were broken from.

No, Jeb, we can't break Gilly into a million E-class asteroids. Get out of that ship.
I like this idea.... Kessler syndrome simulator 2014
Hit 2 E-Classes together for a spectacular show! I like this one too. Classic "Asteroids". (Now we need missiles. Zekes, bring a Drek!)
